#Numpy / Opencv

## Simple Print

Larger numpy arrays are truncated when viewed in the CLI.
Using simpleprint 

```python
image = open_grayscale_image(fname='5.png')
print(simple_print(image))
thresholded = thresholding(image=image)
print(simple_print(thresholded))
```
